title: Understanding Financial Challenges
text: Families with a child with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) often face unique financial challenges. Consider the types of expenses that might increase due to the need for specialized care and support.

title: Types of Additional Support
text: Think about the types of additional support that might be necessary for a child with ASD. This could include therapies, specialized education, or other forms of assistance.

title: Identifying Financial Strain
text: What is one common financial issue that families with a child with ASD might face?
choices: need to travel to provide more stimulation
